paragraphs.text: Deutscher Science Fiction Preis is a German literary award. Together with the Kurd-Laßwitz-Preis, it is one of the most prestigious awards for German science fiction literature. The award was established in 1985 by the Science Fiction Club Deutschland [de], a German Science Fiction society. Each year, the award is given to the best German science fiction short story and the best German novel from the previous year.
